titles.title: A bill to authorize the minting of a coin in honor of the 75th anniversary of the end of World War II, and for other purposes.
A bill to authorize the minting of a coin in honor of the 75th anniversary of the end of World War II, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
